title.rendered: “IDF Counterattacks: Striking Hezbollah’s Launch Sites and Military Structures in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A military structure associated with the Radwan force and a launch site from which fire was carried out towards the Meron area; IDF forces attacked a Hezbollah terror target in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, Air Force fighter jets attacked a launch site of the Hezbollah terror organization from which fire was directed at the Meron area earlier today.

In addition, fighter planes attacked a military structure associated with the Radwan force in the Hezbollah terror organization in the Jabal Rizlan area, alongside a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Blida area in southern Lebanon.

During the day, several launches were made to several areas in the north of the country, in response the IDF attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4bleu5Y
